name: Rosé Sangria
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle (750 ml) dry rosé, preferably Spanish or French
1/4 cup simple syrup, or more to taste
3 cups sliced oranges, lemons, limes, apples, and blackberries or blueberries

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the wine, orange juice, brandy, triple sec, and simple syrup in a large pitcher. Taste for sweetness, adding more simple syrup if needed. Add half of the fruit and refrigerate for at least 8 hours and up to 24 hours.
